definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ge 27:9 kid (NH id., Ar. jadyun, Ph. [[גדא]], Aram. [[גַּדְיׇא]], gadyo0; cf. As. gadû, gadiia, Meissner:ZA iv. 1889, 286 Zehnpfund:BAS i. 505)—[[גְּדִי]] Ge 38:17 + 12 t. (abs. Ge 38:23 +, & (generally) cstr. Ge 38:17 +); pl. [[גְּדָיִים]] 1Sa 10:3, cstr. [[גְּדָיֵי]] Ge 27:9, Ge 27:16—kid, almost always [[עִזּֽים]] ´[[ג]] Ge 27:9, Ge 27:16, Ge 38:17, Ge 38:20, Ju Jdg 6:19, Jdg 13:15, Jdg 13:19, Jdg 15:1, 1Sa 16:20; abs. Ex 23:19, Ex 34:26, De 14:21 (all [[בחלב אמו]] ´[[לא תבשׁל ג]]), & c. art. ´[[הַגּ]] Ge 38:23, Ju Jdg 14:6; abs. pl. 1Sa 10:3; —cf. also [[עֵין גֶּ֫דִי]].
